testcase.name: strike should return the right score
strike should not return the right score
spare should return the right score
spare should not return the right score
sumRolls should return the right score
sumRolls should not return the right score
play all rolls with 0 should return a score of 0
play all rolls with 1 should return a score of 20
play all rolls with 1 except one with 1 spare should return a score of 29
play all rolls with 1 except one with 1 strike should return a score of 30
play all rolls with 1 except a spare at the end with 2 should return a score of 31
play a strike at the start and a spare at the end with 2 should return a score of 40
play should return a score of 300
